privacyPolicyPage.introduction: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal and agricultural data is handled with transparency and care. This Privacy Policy explains how our platform collects, uses, stores, and safeguards the information you provide while using our services. By accessing the website, you consent to the practices described here and acknowledge that we prioritize the responsible handling of data to deliver a secure and reliable experience.
privacyPolicyPage.informationWeCollect: We may collect personal information such as your name, email, phone number, location, and account details, along with agricultural data like soil inputs, crop details, and images submitted for predictions. We also gather technical information, including device details, cookies, and interaction logs, to support system functionality. All collected data is essential for delivering accurate recommendations, maintaining account security, and improving service quality.
privacyPolicyPage.howWeUseYourInformation: Your information is used to create and manage accounts, deliver personalized recommendations, process advisory or prediction requests, enhance system performance, and provide user support. We also use aggregated and anonymized data to improve our AI models and overall platform efficiency. No personal data is sold or rented to external parties.
privacyPolicyPage.dataSharingSecurityHeading: Data Sharing, Security, and Third-Party Services
privacyPolicyPage.dataSharingSecurity: We take strong measures to secure your information through encryption, secure storage, and controlled access. Limited data may be shared with trusted third-party tools such as hosting providers, analytics services, or AI systems strictly to operate and improve the platform. Cookies may be used to maintain sessions and enhance user experience. Data is shared only when legally required or with explicit user consent.
privacyPolicyPage.userRights: You have the right to access your data, request corrections, update your information, or delete your account entirely. You may also withdraw consent at any time or request a copy of your stored information. We are committed to supporting users in managing their data responsibly.
privacyPolicyPage.contactUs: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests related to this Privacy Policy or your personal data, you may contact us at: Email: Krishimitra2025@gmail.com | Project Name: KrishiMitra

hero.title: Growing Futures, One Farm at a Time
hero.description: KrishiMitra began with a simple belief: technology should empower farmers, not complicate their lives. Nepal's agriculture is the backbone of our nation, and our mission is to support the hands that feed it.

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.paragraph1: The idea behind KrishiMitra was born from observing the struggles that many Nepali farmers face every season. Wrong crop choices, unexpected disease outbreaks, and lack of scientific guidance often lead to heavy losses. Despite advances in technology, most digital tools feel too complex or inaccessible for everyday farmers.
beginning.question: What if farmers had a digital friend — a true 'mitra' — that understands their soil, their crops, and their challenges?
beginning.paragraph2: With this vision, KrishiMitra took its first steps as an academic project, but it quickly grew into something much bigger: a mission to support the hands that feed our nation.

whyKrishiMitra.title: Why KrishiMitra?
whyKrishiMitra.description: A digital companion built for Nepali farmers, combining local reality with data, AI, and compassion.
whyKrishiMitra.tagline: Rooted in real field problems, designed for everyday use.

problem.title: The Problem We Saw
problem.description: Nepali farmers deserve better tools. Across communities, the same challenges kept appearing:
items: Digital solutions that are either too complex or too expensive.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: KrishiMitra was designed to bridge this gap with simplicity, intelligence, and accessibility. The platform brings together modern technology and practical farming needs:
items: Smart crop recommendation based on soil inputs.
Soil analysis support using pH, NPK, and moisture.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower every Nepali farmer with intelligent, accessible, and science-backed agricultural guidance that improves decision-making and productivity.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To build Nepal's most trusted digital agriculture companion — one that supports farmers from seed to harvest, improving outcomes for generations to come.

items.title: Trust
items.description: Farmers deserve guidance they can rely on. Every insight is rooted in data and careful design.

items.title: Simplicity
items.description: Technology should feel friendly, not overwhelming. KrishiMitra is built for clarity and ease.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: AI, data, and modern tools are brought straight to the field, where they can create real change.

items.title: Impact
items.description: Better decisions, better harvest, better life. Every feature is built with impact in mind.

items.title: Research & Real Stories
items.text: The journey started with understanding real problems faced by farmers across different regions and farming conditions.

items.title: Designing the Experience
items.text: Wireframes and interfaces were crafted to keep everything simple, clear, and friendly for first-time digital users.

items.title: Building the Intelligence
items.text: AI tools and models were integrated to support crop diagnosis, soil-based advisory, and smarter recommendations.

items.title: Testing & Refinement
items.text: The platform was refined step-by-step, shaped by feedback, iteration, and continuous learning.

meetProject.title: Meet the Project
meetProject.paragraph1: KrishiMitra is developed with the hope of creating real social impact through technology. What started as a Final Year Project evolved into a commitment to empower farmers with modern, accessible agricultural assistance.
meetProject.question: How can we make farming easier, smarter, and more effective?

future.title: The Future of KrishiMitra
future.description: This is just the beginning. Ahead lies a future filled with possibilities:
items: Voice assistant features for elderly farmers.

closingNote.title: A Closing Note
closingNote.description: KrishiMitra is more than a platform. It is a promise — to support the hands that feed Nepal. Thank you for being part of this journey. Together, we grow.

faqs.q: How do I use the disease detection feature?
faqs.a: Upload a clear photo of the affected crop. The AI analyzes it and displays possible diseases.

faqs.q: Which crops are supported in KrishiMitra?
faqs.a: Currently Potato, Tomato, and Maize. More crops will be added soon.

faqs.q: How do I input soil information?
faqs.a: Enter pH, NPK values, moisture levels, and additional soil parameters in the crop recommendation tool.
